name: Fayçal MERABET
desc: A creative mind hailing from Algeria, weaving digital wonders.
aboutDesc: I'm Fayçal MERABET, a dynamic Full Stack Web Developer with over 3 years of hands-on experience. Specializing in the MERN stack and related technologies, I craft and deploy robust web applications that drive business growth. Proficient in PHP, Laravel, and WordPress customization, I seamlessly integrate APIs like SendGrid and Firebase, enriching functionality with email automation, chatbots, and SMS capabilities. Beyond conventional web development, I venture into indie and interactive game creation using Unity with C#, targeting versatile WebGL platforms. My expertise extends to effective teamwork and client management, ensuring seamless project execution and satisfaction. With a proactive approach to communication using platforms like Teams and Slack, I guarantee a smooth collaboration experience. Constantly evolving, I prioritize professional development through Udemy courses in app development, game design, and cloud computing on AWS. My journey into web development began as a Computer Science student, further refined through a rigorous Full Stack JavaScript Bootcamp at Go My Code in 2022. Eager to contribute my technical proficiency, creative problem-solving skills, and passion for innovation to your remote development team, I'm committed to driving your project's success.

projects.project-detail: `L'éternelle Des Plantes` is a MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) e-commerce web application dedicated to offering a diverse range of plant products. Seamlessly blending functionality with aesthetic appeal, this platform provides users with an immersive shopping experience for all things botanical. From browsing a curated selection of plants to securely completing transactions, `L'éternelle Des Plantes` prioritizes user convenience and satisfaction. With intuitive navigation and robust backend architecture, the application ensures seamless performance and reliability. Explore the green world of `L'éternelle Des Plantes` and bring the beauty of nature into your home with just a few clicks.
